name: Kajko i Kokosz: Mirmiłowo Wielkie
summary: The plot of the story focuses on the conspiracy of an evil sorcerer who plans to take over the family town of our heroes. As you can easily guess, the two inseparable friends will quickly decipher his intentions and try to thwart the villain's evil plans. In this chapter of the game, we witness the arrival of a mysterious merchant named Hodon to Mirmiłów. By giving the Castellan a vision of building a stone fortress, the villain quickly ingratiates himself with him, leading to a drastic increase in taxes and sidelining Kajko and Kokosz. However, the fearless warriors decide to regain their former influence and help the Castellan, who is unknowingly getting into more and more trouble.
